Example.1: Completed a stunning project in the Netherlands - 3-storey house. Bright and aesthetic modern interior.
Example.2: The kitchen-living room is spacious and built on the contrast of colors and finishing materials. The dining room is very elegant and atmospheric. The chandelier above the dining area adds sophistication to the interior.
Example.3: The guest bathroom is bright with a large mirror and lighting that visually expands the space.
Example.4: The key point in this project is practicality. Everything superfluous is hidden from view behind the facades of storage systems. Thanks to this, the interior looks light, not overloaded.
Example.5: The hall is a space that cannot be ignored. We tried to make it as spectacular and comfortable as possible, since the hall is the first impression of the entire interior.
Example.6: The bedroom is done in neutral tones with rich color accents. The bathroom has clean lines, graphics and functionality.
Example.7: This project even has a lounge with a cinema hall. Enjoy watching!
